content.rendered:
This project truly is the embodiment of the essence of grandeur. A titanic structure that stands in the Bashundhara L block, Edison Titania projects a vision of magnificence. Develop with precision and care, this south-facing beauty is develop on a residential land area of twenty Katha. And to complement the property area, this structure boasts a total of 16 floors.


It is not enough to speak of the sheer size of this massive establishment. The exterior of this premium-grade compound is design to inspire awe in onlookers. Every resident or visitor arriving, is greet with a resplendent double-height entrance follow a serene green lawn, that is bound to invoke relaxation. Adorned with aesthetic materials, the exterior focuses on a brilliantly designed facade. Architectural choices are based on defining the grand scale of the project. On the rooftop of the building, there is a leisure area for denizens to enjoy. It also features a breathtaking infinity swimming pool.


The grandiose of outside continues inside. The interior of Edison Titania features the same scale of magnificence as the exterior. The lobby’s aesthetic speaks calmness with a spectacular view for visitors. Every inch of the interior is craft with the most cutting-edge and elegant materials. Every inch of space is utiliz. There are three units on each floor with three- or four-bedroom choices. Each apartment has the most luxurious fittings and modern-style bathrooms. And are also exquisite kitchens include.


A meeting room for building residents to convene and discuss ongoings. The fully equipped gym allows everyone to stay fit. A prayer area for everyone to say daily prayers together. The children’s play area offers a chance for children of the building to pass their time and give their parents a chance to relax. For conveniencthere are also two high-quality lifts and one passenger and one stretcher.


Edison Titania features 33 apartments in total. And all residents of those apartments are bound for a life of sheer luxury and premium living. The residential building offers a multitude of commuter comforts. Easy access to some of the topmost Universities of the country, shopping centres, schools and other conveniences.
